page.title: 11RELIGION
page.content: A questionnaire was given to people attending chapel & church one Sunday.There were 59 replies. 34% of the sample were between 30-60yr and 59% were over 60yrs. 89% attend morning service regularly 11% occasionally.47% go to evening service regularly,29% occasionally. 64% attend with members of their family. Apart from the 8 joint services a year,49% have attended services at other denominations. 91% went to Sunday school;41% because it was compulsory.Only 10% felt it had been unhelpful in developing faith. Religious observance lapsed for a period for 37%(Usually at 30 -40 yrs. 62% belong to church based groups. There is 1 methodist chapel and 1 church.R.C's(Very few) worship at a convent near Talland.
